> base64-api:[atob](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/atob)base64-api:[btoa](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/btoa)[charCodeAt](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String/charCodeAt)
```javascript
function base64ToBlob() {
	// mime
	var mimeType = base64URI.split(',')[0].split(':')[1].split(';')[0]; 
	// base64
	var atobBase64 = atob(base64URI.split(',')[1]); //base64 
	// 
	var arrayBuffer = new ArrayBuffer(atobBase64.length);
	// api - 
	var typeArray01 = new Uint8Array(arrayBuffer)
	// barse64
	for (var i = 0; i < atobBase64.length; i++) {
		typeArray01[i] = atobBase64.charCodeAt(i);
	}
	new Blob([typeArray01], {type: mimeType});
}
```
